name: Gloomstalker Bear

description: A boar whose tusks have calcified into organic steel. Hunting one is the standard rite of passage for Hawksley initiates.

name: Storm-Winged Eagle
image_prompt: A colossal eagle with lightning arcing across its wings, flying in a storm.
description: The apex predator of the high peaks. Its feathers are prized fletching for Hawksley archers, but few survive the climb to its nest.
